commits.name: Commit-0
commits.content:
workflows:
  ios-ci-build:
    name: iOS CI Build
    max_build_duration: 30
    instance_type: mac_mini_m1
    environment:
      node: 18.17.1
      xcode: latest
      cocoapods: default
      vars:
        RCT_NEW_ARCH_ENABLED: 0
        USE_HERMES: 1
        IPHONEOS_DEPLOYMENT_TARGET: "13.0"
    cache:
      cache_paths:
        - ~/.npm
        - ~/Library/Caches/CocoaPods
        - ios/Pods
        - node_modules
    scripts:
      - name: Install npm dependencies
        script: |
          npm ci
      - name: Install Pods
        script: |
          cd ios
          pod install --repo-update
      - name: Build iOS
        script: |
          cd ios
          xcodebuild \
            -workspace rntesttwo.xcworkspace \
            -scheme rntesttwo \
            -configuration Release \
            -sdk iphoneos \
            -derivedDataPath build \
            CODE_SIGNING_ALLOWED=NO \
            CODE_SIGNING_REQUIRED=NO \
            CODE_SIGN_IDENTITY="" \
            CODE_SIGN_ENTITLEMENTS="" \
            RCT_NEW_ARCH_ENABLED=0 \
            ONLY_ACTIVE_ARCH=NO \
            IPHONEOS_DEPLOYMENT_TARGET=13.0
      - name: Package IPA
        script: |
          cd ios
          mkdir Payload
          cp -r build/Build/Products/Release-iphoneos/*.app Payload/
          zip -r app.ipa Payload/
          rm -rf Payload/
    artifacts:
      - ios/app.ipa
